page.title: 07SCHOOL TIMETABLE
page.content: Every day we do{Maths and {English}and have a school assembly usually taken by a teacher often helped by children.{On Wednesday {morning}the{vicar}comes into school for{assembly}and then takes{R.E.}with the{Upper Juniors.}On{Monday afternoon {the Junior children}go{swimming}at the {Leisure Centre}in{Kendal.}On{Tuesday {afternoon}we do{topic work.}On Wednesday afternoon we can{sew}with Mrs.{Townson}and Mrs.{Marrison,}cook with Mrs.{Howson}(all three used to have children at{our school)}or do woodwork and gardening with Mr. {Gaskins. Thursday morning}sees us doing{P.E.}and in the{afternoon}we have{art. Our games afternoon}is {Friday. School starts}at{9a.m.}and {finishes}at{3.30p.m.(3.20p.m. for {infants)}and we have{lunch time}from {midday}to{1.15p.m.
